root.name: Ballistic
root.description: OverviewBallistic, known as Puzz Loop in its arcade beginnings, is a frantic puzzle game where you fire colored balls at an encroaching spiral line of balls, trying to make three in a row which then explode and clear space. If the game looks or sounds familiar it is because it is essentially the same game as Popcap's Zuma - Ballistic's Japanese creators threatened legal proceedings but it is unknown and considered unlikely that these resulted in official court proceedings.
